org.apache.poi.hsmf

Class MAPIMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.POIDocument
      • org.apache.poi.POIReadOnlyDocument
        • org.apache.poi.hsmf.MAPIMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class MAPIMessage
extends POIReadOnlyDocument
    Reads an Outlook MSG File in and provides hooks into its data structure. If you want to develop with HSMF, you might find it worth getting some of the Microsoft public documentation, such as: [MS-OXCMSG]: Message and Attachment Object Protocol Specification(读取OutlookMSG文件并提供其数据结构的挂钩。如果您想使用HMF进行开发，您可能会发现值得获取一些Microsoft公共文档，例如：[MS-OXCMSG]：消息和附件对象协议规范)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MAPIMessage.MESSAGE_CLASS
      A MAPI file can be an email (NOTE) or a number of other types(收件箱文件可以是电子邮件（注）或多种其他类型)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AttachmentChunks[] getAttachmentFiles()
      Gets the message attachments.(获取消息附件。)
      java.lang.String getConversationTopic()
      Gets the conversation topic of the parsed Outlook Message.(获取已分析的OutlookMessage的对话主题。)
      java.lang.String getDisplayBCC()
      Gets the display value of the "BCC" line of the outlook message.(获取outlook消息“BCC”行的显示值。)
      java.lang.String getDisplayCC()
      Gets the display value of the "CC" line of the outlook message.(获取outlook消息“CC”行的显示值。)
      java.lang.String getDisplayFrom()
      Gets the display value of the "FROM" line of the outlook message This is not the actual address that was sent from but the formated display of the user name.(获取outlook消息“START”行的显示值这不是发送的实际地址，而是用户名的格式显示。)
      java.lang.String getDisplayTo()
      Gets the display value of the "TO" line of the outlook message.(获取outlook消息“TO”行的显示值。)
      java.lang.String[] getHeaders()
      Returns all the headers, one entry per line(返回所有标题，每行一个条目)
      java.lang.String getHtmlBody()
      Gets the html body of this Outlook Message, if this email contains a html version.(如果此电子邮件包含html版本，则获取此Outlook邮件的html正文。)
      Chunks getMainChunks()
      Gets the main, core details chunks(获取主要的核心详细信息块)
      MAPIMessage.MESSAGE_CLASS getMessageClassEnum()
      Gets the message class of the parsed Outlook Message.(获取已分析的OutlookMessage的消息类。)
      java.util.Calendar getMessageDate()
      Gets the date that the message was accepted by the server on.(获取服务器接受消息的日期。)
      NameIdChunks getNameIdChunks()
      Gets the Name ID chunks, or null if there aren't any(获取Name ID块，如果没有，则为null)
      RecipientChunks[] getRecipientDetailsChunks()
      Gets all the recipient details chunks.(获取所有收件人详细信息块。)
      java.lang.String getRecipientEmailAddress()
      Returns all the recipients' email address, separated by semicolons.(返回所有收件人的电子邮件地址，以逗号分隔。)
      java.lang.String[] getRecipientEmailAddressList()
      Returns an array of all the recipient's email address, normally in TO then CC then BCC order.(返回所有收件人电子邮件地址的数组，通常按照TO、CC、BCC顺序。)
      java.lang.String getRecipientNames()
      Returns all the recipients' names, separated by semicolons.(返回所有收件人的姓名，以逗号分隔。)
      java.lang.String[] getRecipientNamesList()
      Returns an array of all the recipient's names, normally in TO then CC then BCC order.(返回所有收件人姓名的数组，通常按照TO、CC、BCC顺序。)
      java.lang.String getRtfBody()
      Gets the RTF Rich Message body of this Outlook Message, if this email contains a RTF (rich) version.(如果此电子邮件包含CTF（富）版本，则获取此Outlook邮件的CTF Rich Message正文。)
      java.lang.String getStringFromChunk(StringChunk chunk)
      Gets a string value based on the passed chunk.(基于传递的块获取字符串值。)

      Gets the plain text body of this Outlook Message(获取此Outlook邮件的纯文本正文)

      Tries to identify the correct encoding for 7-bit (non-unicode) strings in the file.(尝试识别文件中7位（非Unicode）字符串的正确编码。)
      boolean has7BitEncodingStrings()
      Does this file contain any strings that are stored as 7 bit rather than unicode?(此文件是否包含任何存储为7位而不是unicode的字符串？)
      boolean isReturnNullOnMissingChunk()
      Will you get a null on a missing chunk, or a ChunkNotFoundException (default is the exception).(您会在丢失的块上获得空值，还是ChunkNotFoundResponse异常（默认为异常）。)
      void set7BitEncoding(java.lang.String charset)
      Many messages store their strings as unicode, which is nice and easy.(许多消息将其字符串存储为unicode，这既好又简单。)
      void set7BitEncoding(java.lang.String generalcharset, java.lang.String htmlbodycharset, java.lang.String bodycharset) 
      void setReturnNullOnMissingChunk(boolean returnNullOnMissingChunk)
      Sets whether on asking for a missing chunk, you get back null or a ChunkNotFoundException (default is the exception).(设置在请求丢失的块时，是否返回空值或ChunkNotFoundResponse异常（默认为异常）。)

      • MAPIMessage

        public MAPIMessage(java.io.InputStream in)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for reading MSG Files from an input stream.

        Note - this will buffer the whole message into memory in order to process. For lower memory use, use MAPIMessage(File)

        (用于从输入流读取MSG文件的构造器。注意-这会将整个消息缓冲到内存中以便处理。对于更低的内存使用，请使用MAPIMessage（文件）)
        Parameters:
        in - The InputStream to buffer then read from(in -要缓冲然后读取的InputStream)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on errors reading, or invalid data(java.io. IOResponse-读取错误或数据无效)

            throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for reading MSG Files from a POIFS filesystem(用于从POIFS文件系统读取MSG文件的构造器)
        Parameters:
        fs - Open POIFS FileSystem containing the message(fs -打开包含消息的POIFS文件系统)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on errors reading, or invalid data(java.io. IOResponse-读取错误或数据无效)

      • getDisplayFrom

        public java.lang.String getDisplayFrom()
                                throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Gets the display value of the "FROM" line of the outlook message This is not the actual address that was sent from but the formated display of the user name.(获取outlook消息“START”行的显示值这不是发送的实际地址，而是用户名的格式显示。)

      • getDisplayTo

        public java.lang.String getDisplayTo()
                              throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Gets the display value of the "TO" line of the outlook message. If there are multiple recipients, they will be separated by semicolons. This is not the actual list of addresses/values that will be sent to if you click Reply in the email - those are stored in RecipientChunks.(获取outlook消息“TO”行的显示值。如果有多个收件人，他们将被气球分开。如果您在电子邮件中单击“回复”，这不是将发送到的地址/值的实际列表-这些地址/值存储在RecipientChunks中。)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException - If the to-chunk does not exist and returnNullOnMissingChunk is set(ChunkNotFoundException -如果to-chunk不存在并且设置了returnNullOnMissingChunk)

      • getDisplayCC

        public java.lang.String getDisplayCC()
                              throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Gets the display value of the "CC" line of the outlook message. If there are multiple recipients, they will be separated by semicolons. This is not the actual list of addresses/values that will be sent to if you click Reply in the email - those are stored in RecipientChunks.(获取outlook消息“CC”行的显示值。如果有多个收件人，他们将被气球分开。如果您在电子邮件中单击“回复”，这不是将发送到的地址/值的实际列表-这些地址/值存储在RecipientChunks中。)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException - If the cc-chunk does not exist and returnNullOnMissingChunk is set(ChunkNotFoundResponse-如果cc-chunk不存在并且returnNullOnMissingChunk已设置)

      • getDisplayBCC

        public java.lang.String getDisplayBCC()
                               throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Gets the display value of the "BCC" line of the outlook message. If there are multiple recipients, they will be separated by semicolons. This is not the actual list of addresses/values that will be sent to if you click Reply in the email - those are stored in RecipientChunks. This will only be present in sent emails, not received ones!(获取outlook消息“BCC”行的显示值。如果有多个收件人，他们将被气球分开。如果您在电子邮件中单击“回复”，这不是将发送到的地址/值的实际列表-这些地址/值存储在RecipientChunks中。这将仅出现在发送的电子邮件中，而不是收到的电子邮件中！)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException - If the bcc-chunk does not exist and returnNullOnMissingChunk is set(ChunkNotFoundResponse-如果bcc-chunk不存在并且returnNullOnMissingChunk已设置)

      • getRecipientEmailAddress

        public java.lang.String getRecipientEmailAddress()
                                          throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Returns all the recipients' email address, separated by semicolons. Checks all the likely chunks in search of the addresses.(返回所有收件人的电子邮件地址，以逗号分隔。检查所有可能的块以搜索地址。)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException(ChunkNotFoundExcept)

      • getRecipientEmailAddressList

        public java.lang.String[] getRecipientEmailAddressList()
                                                throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Returns an array of all the recipient's email address, normally in TO then CC then BCC order. Checks all the likely chunks in search of the addresses.(返回所有收件人电子邮件地址的数组，通常按照TO、CC、BCC顺序。检查所有可能的块以搜索地址。)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException(ChunkNotFoundExcept)

      • getRecipientNames

        public java.lang.String getRecipientNames()
                                   throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Returns all the recipients' names, separated by semicolons. Checks all the likely chunks in search of the names. See also getDisplayTo(), getDisplayCC() and getDisplayBCC().(返回所有收件人的姓名，以逗号分隔。检查所有可能的块以搜索名称。另请参见getDisplayTo（）、getDisplayCC（）和getDisplayBCC（）。)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException(ChunkNotFoundExcept)

      • getRecipientNamesList

        public java.lang.String[] getRecipientNamesList()
                                         throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Returns an array of all the recipient's names, normally in TO then CC then BCC order. Checks all the likely chunks in search of the names. See also getDisplayTo(), getDisplayCC() and getDisplayBCC().(返回所有收件人姓名的数组，通常按照TO、CC、BCC顺序。检查所有可能的块以搜索名称。另请参见getDisplayTo（）、getDisplayCC（）和getDisplayBCC（）。)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException(ChunkNotFoundExcept)

      • guess7BitEncoding

        public void guess7BitEncoding()
        Tries to identify the correct encoding for 7-bit (non-unicode) strings in the file.

        Many messages store their strings as unicode, which is nice and easy. Some use one-byte encodings for their strings, but don't always store the encoding anywhere helpful in the file.

        This method checks for codepage properties, and failing that looks at the headers for the message, and uses these to guess the correct encoding for your file.

        Bug #49441 has more on why this is needed

        (尝试识别文件中7位（非Unicode）字符串的正确编码。许多消息将其字符串存储为unicode，这既好又简单。有些人对其字符串使用一字节编码，但并不总是将编码存储在文件中任何有帮助的地方。此方法检查代码页属性，如果失败，将查看消息的标头，并使用这些来猜测文件的正确编码。Bug #49441详细说明了为什么需要这样做)

      • set7BitEncoding

        public void set7BitEncoding(java.lang.String charset)
        Many messages store their strings as unicode, which is nice and easy. Some use one-byte encodings for their strings, but don't easily store the encoding anywhere in the file! If you know what the encoding is of your file, you can use this method to set the 7 bit encoding for all the non unicode strings in the file.(许多消息将其字符串存储为unicode，这既好又简单。有些人对其字符串使用一字节编码，但不容易将编码存储在文件中的任何地方！如果您知道文件的编码是什么，则可以使用此方法为文件中所有非Unicode字符串设置7位编码。)
        See Also:
        guess7BitEncoding()

      • set7BitEncoding

        public void set7BitEncoding(java.lang.String generalcharset,
                            java.lang.String htmlbodycharset,
                            java.lang.String bodycharset)

      • has7BitEncodingStrings

        public boolean has7BitEncodingStrings()
        Does this file contain any strings that are stored as 7 bit rather than unicode?(此文件是否包含任何存储为7位而不是unicode的字符串？)

      • getHeaders

        public java.lang.String[] getHeaders()
                              throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Returns all the headers, one entry per line(返回所有标题，每行一个条目)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException(ChunkNotFoundExcept)

      • getConversationTopic

        public java.lang.String getConversationTopic()
                                      throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Gets the conversation topic of the parsed Outlook Message. This is the part of the subject line that is after the RE: and FWD:(获取已分析的OutlookMessage的对话主题。这是主题行中RE：和FWD：之后的部分)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException - If the conversation-topic chunk does not exist and returnNullOnMissingChunk is set(ChunkNotFoundResponse-如果对话主题块不存在并且设置了returnNullOnMissingChunk)

      • getMessageClassEnum

        public MAPIMessage.MESSAGE_CLASS getMessageClassEnum()
                                              throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Gets the message class of the parsed Outlook Message. (Yes, you can use this to determine if a message is a calendar item, note, or actual outlook Message) For emails the class will be IPM.Note(获取已分析的OutlookMessage的消息类。(Yes，您可以使用它来确定消息是否是日历项、笔记或实际的outlook消息）对于电子邮件，该类别将是IPL。注意)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException - If the message-class chunk does not exist and returnNullOnMissingChunk is set(ChunkNotFoundResponse-如果消息类块不存在并且returnNullOnMissingChunk已设置)

      • getMessageDate

        public java.util.Calendar getMessageDate()
                                  throws ChunkNotFoundException
        Gets the date that the message was accepted by the server on.(获取服务器接受消息的日期。)
        Throws:
        ChunkNotFoundException(ChunkNotFoundExcept)

      • getMainChunks

        public Chunks getMainChunks()
        Gets the main, core details chunks(获取主要的核心详细信息块)

      • getRecipientDetailsChunks

        public RecipientChunks[] getRecipientDetailsChunks()
        Gets all the recipient details chunks. These will normally be in the order of: * TO recipients, in the order returned by getDisplayTo() * CC recipients, in the order returned by getDisplayCC() * BCC recipients, in the order returned by getDisplayBCC()(获取所有收件人详细信息块。这些通常按照以下顺序排列：* TO收件人，按照getDisplay To（）返回的顺序 * CC收件人，按照getDisplay CC（）返回的顺序 * BCC收件人，按照getDisplay BCC（）返回的顺序)

      • getNameIdChunks

        public NameIdChunks getNameIdChunks()
        Gets the Name ID chunks, or null if there aren't any(获取Name ID块，如果没有，则为null)

      • getAttachmentFiles

        public AttachmentChunks[] getAttachmentFiles()
        Gets the message attachments.(获取消息附件。)

      • isReturnNullOnMissingChunk

        public boolean isReturnNullOnMissingChunk()
        Will you get a null on a missing chunk, or a ChunkNotFoundException (default is the exception).(您会在丢失的块上获得空值，还是ChunkNotFoundResponse异常（默认为异常）。)

      • setReturnNullOnMissingChunk

        public void setReturnNullOnMissingChunk(boolean returnNullOnMissingChunk)
        Sets whether on asking for a missing chunk, you get back null or a ChunkNotFoundException (default is the exception).(设置在请求丢失的块时，是否返回空值或ChunkNotFoundResponse异常（默认为异常）。)
